divs: sighting detailsi was watching the pbs documentary when i noticed something odd in the video. at 13:25 into the video something odd seems to appear from the bottom left and move toward the right. at 13:28 exactly it appears to be going over the back of the aircraft. i just wanted to know if you guys have ever debunked this video. i just thought it was odd. here is the link to the video. http:\\www.pbs.org\wgbh\nova\space\crash-flight-447.html 13:25 the object appears from the botton left then moves toward the right. at 13:28 the scene switches to something else but if you stop it at 13:28 looks like it was going over the aircraft and not under.
